trans-unit.source: Provides a unified way of converting types of values to other types, as well as for accessing standard values and subproperties.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Layout.TableLayoutSettingsTypeConverter"></xref> class.
Determines whether this converter can convert an object in the given source type to the native type of this converter.
An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref> that provides a format context.
A <xref:System.Type> that represents the type you want to convert from.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if this converter can perform the conversion; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Returns a value indicating whether this converter can convert an object to the given destination type by using the context.
An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref> that provides a format context.
A <xref:System.Type> that represents the type you want to convert to.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if this converter can perform the conversion; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Converts the given object to the type of this converter by using the specified context and culture information.
An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref> that provides a format context.
The <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> to use as the current culture.
The <xref:System.Object> to convert.
An <xref:System.Object> that represents the converted value.
Converts the given value object to the specified type by using the specified context and culture information.
An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref> that provides a format context.
The <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> to use as the current culture.
The <xref:System.Object> to convert.
The <xref:System.Type> to convert the value parameter to.
An <xref:System.Object> that represents the converted value.
destinationType is .
